title: #364: Epstein, 9/11, the Babylon System and the Toothless Tiger with Cro Mag's John Joseph
description:
Thank you so much for tuning in for another episode of Tin Foil Hat with Sam Tripoli. This episode I welcome Cro Mag's John Joseph to talk about his life as a Punk Rocker, Epstein, 9/11 and how you have question everything. Thank you so much for your support!

See Sam Tripoli Live:
Appleton Wisconsin Sept 10th-12th: Headlining the Skyline Comedy Club:
www.skylinecomedy.com/events/40525

www.goodnightscomedy.com/
